# text

**Instance Property**

The text that the text view displays.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var text: String! { get set }
```

## Discussion

In iOS 6 and later, assigning a new value to this property also replaces the value of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextView/attributedText] property with the same text, albeit without any inherent style attributes. Instead the text view styles the new string using the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextView/font], [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextView/textColor], and other style-related properties of the class.

## Specifying the text content

- **attributedText**: The styled text that the text view displays.
